VCs pass on countless deals throughout their careersâ€¦
And inevitably, some of those passes become massive wins.
Here are the 3 questions Rick Smith asks himself when a pass wins big:

1. Did we even see the deal?
- If not, why not? Was it in our network? In our market? Thatâ€™s a sourcing gap.

2. Was it in our strike zone?
- Right stage, right sector, right founder? If not, maybe it just wasnâ€™t a fit.

3. Did we follow our process?
- If yes, then even a miss is a win. Because consistency > regret.

ğŸ’¡ The takeaway: Donâ€™t obsess over what you didnâ€™t do.

Obsess over having a repeatable process â€” and sticking to it.
